phrases: Well, I doubt it will do any good.
Did they move in that one instant?
Dammit, I cannot hold my breath any longer...
Those tiny bugs are better than we thought, huh?
It is a rare species that is able to change their battle power without transforming.
You have got some nice friends there, Vegeta- chan!
Those guys' speed and power is incomparably better
than the last time we fought.
You have increased your destructive power several steps over what it was before, Gohan!
That is all thanks to having Grand Elder- sama unleash my power!
But that guy fled all the way over there.
I am sure he must have stopped time again.
W - wait, there is no need to run away.
All right, l'll start with that pipsqueak over there.
Oh, man, we almost had him!
What are we going to do with Ghurd?
He is having trouble with them.
At this rate, we are going to have to redo our bet.
All right, I will bet this bar of chocolate that he finishes it in the next minute.
Attacking while keeping time stopped consumes energy too briskly!
I do not know what is going on!
Kuririn and Gohan took the Dragon Ball they worked so hard to get,
Vegeta was with them, you say?
What on earth does that mean?
lf I knew that, I would not be letting it get to me, would l?
l cannot stand anything that is been happening lately.
So you say, but did not your space capsule get all busted up?
There is no way you can come home, is there?
But then, it is been six days since Goku took off from here,
so he should be arriving pretty soon.
I cannot hear you very well!
What is everyone thinking, tossing a lady aside like this!?
Every time he stops time, he gets more worn out!
All right, let us keep attacking him like this!
l do not have enough energy!
l think l'll go hide somewhere and rest for a bit.
Let us see, let us see...
How did they know I was here!?
You are going to bring shame upon the Ginyu Special Corps!
If you get yourself beaten by those pipsqueaks,
I am not going to play with you anymore!
You will have to take your 3 of the clock snack separately, too!
I- I just got a little bit careless!
I am going to put these maggots away right now!
All right, if that is how they want it, I will use my trump card!
No matter how hard you struggle, you cannot move!
What happened to all that energy you had earlier?
Looks like Ghurd is getting pretty anxious.
He is using his paralysis technique, which he does not show off that often.
And against those two sawed-off little bugs, too.
After I told them to watch out for his supernatural powers,
they go launching a frontal assault.
I am going to get you good for all the embarrassment you have caused me.
Your flesh is so soft, huh?
All right, now it is time for the 100-blow punishment.
I am going to hit you a hundred times!
I will do it to you, too, just to be fair.
Hey, Ghurd, how long are you going to keep this up?
You are holding up the next fight!
Hurry up and finish them off!
I am going to skewer you!
You might be good if I cooked you up and ate you!
Yeah, I bet you would like to escape, huh?
If you do not run away soon,
this huge skewer is going to run you through!
Piccolo, are you sensing the Ki on faraway Planet Namek?
Still, there is nothing that you can do with your power as it is now,
I cannot eat with this knife!
All right, I will take care of the kid in the yellow outfit first with this thing,
and then I will use a different supernatural power on the other one!
G- Gohan, can you do anything?
T- this was supposed to be a fight between me and those kids...
That is something that you guys decided for yourselves.
You think there is such a thing as fighting dirty in a war?
T- to think that I would be done in by a lowbrow monkey bastard Saiyan like you...
You are the last person I want to hear that from.
Who would have thought we would ever be saved by you?
Do you think I deliberately rescued you?
I just had the perfect chance to kill that grubby bastard Ghurd, that is all.
This is no time to be feeling relieved.
We will not get lucky this time.
Our Ginyu Special Corps fighting pose will not be as beautiful with one of us missing!
S- sure enough, it is not beautiful.
We will have to have Commander Ginyu think up a new pose for the four of us.
Putting that aside, we have to decide
who is going to take out those two runts in Ghurd's place.
I still get Vegeta, you know.
All right, Jheese, rock-paper-scissors with me.
W- what could those people be thinking?
I cannot figure out their character one bit.
Goku was moments away from landing on Planet Namek.
However, the greatest, most evil emperor in the universe,
Further, Kuririn and the others were squaring off against the Ginyu Special Corps.
Could they defeat ReaCoom, Butta, and Jheese?
